Aquests dies hi ha mobilitzacions multitudinàries a tot el món en què el paper de les dones és significatiu Ana Karina Delgado/ EUROPA PRESS

text:
Women in rebellion

04 Nov 2019, 13:22


1 Comments

Share Facebook Twitter Whatsapp Mail


A protestor against the Iraqi government in Baghdad Ahmed Jadallah / REUTERS



Demonstration against the neoliberal policy of Sebastián Piñera, in Chile Ana Karina Delgado / EUROPA PRESS



A woman demonstrating in Chile Marcelo Hernandez / GETTY



These days there are mass mobilizations around the world in which the role of women is significant Ana Karina Delgado / EUROPA PRESS



Demonstration against the sentence to the Process, in Barcelona PACO FREIRE / GETTY



An Iraqi girl protesting these days in the streets of Baghdad HAIDAR HAMDANI / AFP



Protests in Beirut, Lebanon GETTY IMAGES



Brazilian Indians protest at a Paul Zinken / GETTY trade summit



A girl filming a movie camera in Barcelona, October MIQUEL LLOP / GETTY



A girl with an antiquated mask on the streets of Baghdad AHMED JADALLAH / REUTERS



A protestor in the last 8-M in Barcelona XAVI ARIZA / GETTY



Two girls in protests in the streets of Baghdad, in Iraq THAIER AL-SUDANI / REUTERS



A protestant woman in Turkey against the attacks on the Kurdish people Carlos Jasso / REUTERS



The last National Day of Catalonia, in Barcelona CRISTINA CALDERER



Demonstration in Brazil Lucas Landau / REUTERS



Protests in support of Hong Kong in the streets of London HENRY NICHOLLS / REUTERS



Demonstrators calling for feminist slogans and against government, in Beirut ANDRES MARTINEZ CASARES / REUTERS



One of the protests against the sentence of the Process in Barcelona PERE VIRGILI



Demonstration in Hong Kong PHILIP FONG / AFP



The female presence is key in the protests in Beirut, which continue after the resignation of the Lebanese government NABIL MOUNZER / EFE
